keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rob Pocock's specific action plan for a change, based on thousands of responses from Sutton's residents.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour's Rob Pocock won over 17,200 votes here in 2010, placed 2nd ahead of the 3rd placed Lib Dems.

issues.economy: Rob's voice in the Council has already secured a local economic action plan promoting new jobs
issues.health: Pledged to pressure the Council for a full-time GP surgery in Falcon Lodge

housing.content: Creating new homes you and your family can afford

leaflet.personalStatement: Rob Pocock is a man to trust

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured a local economic action plan for new jobs, pressured for a full-time GP surgery in Falcon Lodge

images.caption: Vote for Labour - It's time for change!
